name: Analytics Dashboard
description: Data visualization and reporting tools to track performance metrics and identify business opportunities.
longDescription:
Our Analytics Dashboard transforms your operational data into actionable insights. With comprehensive reporting and visualization tools, you can track key performance indicators, identify trends, and make data-driven decisions to optimize your business.

Features include:
- Customizable dashboard views
- Occupancy and revenue reports
- Channel performance analysis
- Forecasting and trend identification
- Exportable reports in multiple formats
- Automated scheduled reporting
- Performance benchmarking
